name: gpg-windows-relay-monorepo
description: GPG Windows Relay - Three extension pack for relaying GPG to Windows from remotes

scripts.build: npm run build:bridge && npm run build:remote
scripts.watch: npm run watch:bridge & npm run watch:remote
scripts.package: npm run package:bridge && npm run package:remote && npm run package:pack
scripts.clean: rimraf bridge/out remote/out bridge/*.vsix remote/*.vsix pack/*.vsix
